stories.Title: AI and sustainability
stories.Description: As our familiarity with AI grows, so should our awareness of its implications. Generative AI's reliance on powerful servers raises concerns about data centers' energy consumption and carbon footprint.
stories.Tweet: AI and sustainability 📦 As our familiarity with AI grows, so should our awareness of its implications. Generative AI's reliance on powerful servers raises concerns about data centers' energy consumption and carbon footprint. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/10/10/23911059/ai-climate-impact-google-openai-chatgpt-energy

stories.Title: Even more realistic
stories.Description: Adobe's AI capabilities are advancing, with Firefly taking center stage. The software company recently announced the Firefly Image 2 Model, promising to enhance human features.
stories.Tweet: Even more realistic 📦 Adobe's AI capabilities are advancing, with Firefly taking center stage. The software company recently announced the Firefly Image 2 Model, promising to enhance human features. #ai https://techcrunch.com/2023/10/10/adobe-firefly-can-now-generate-more-realistic-images/

stories.Title: Adobe’s AI detector
stories.Description: With its "icon of transparency," Adobe promotes responsible AI by helping you identify media creators and determine whether artificial intelligence played a role in the content creation process.
stories.Tweet: Adobe’s AI detector 📦 With its "icon of transparency," Adobe promotes responsible AI by helping you identify media creators and determine whether artificial intelligence played a role in the content creation process. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/10/10/23911381/adobe-ai-generated-content-symbol-watermark

stories.Title: It was nice while it lasted
stories.Description: According to analysts, the hype surrounding AI is expected to wane in 2024 due to significant obstacles, including the immense cost of deployment and sustainability.
stories.Tweet: It was nice while it lasted 📦 According to analysts, the hype surrounding AI is expected to wane in 2024 due to significant obstacles, including the immense cost of deployment and sustainability. #ai https://www.businessinsider.com/ai-industry-overhyped-cold-shower-analyst-firm-predicts-2024-2023-10

stories.Title: Unlocking multilingual magic
stories.Description: ElevenLabs brings automation to the dubbing industry with its powerful AI Dubbing, capable of translating speech into over 20 languages, enabling creators to reach global audiences.
stories.Tweet: Unlocking multilingual magic 📦 ElevenLabs brings automation to the dubbing industry with its powerful AI Dubbing, capable of translating speech into over 20 languages, enabling creators to reach global audiences. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/elevenlabs-introduces-ai-dubbing-translating-video-and-audio-into-20-languages/

stories.Title: Evolution for Stennis
stories.Description: NASA's Stennis Space Center is undergoing a transformation into a propulsion hub as they partner with Evolution Space to start solid rocket motor production next year.
stories.Tweet: Evolution for Stennis 📦 NASA's Stennis Space Center is undergoing a transformation into a propulsion hub as they partner with Evolution Space to start solid rocket motor production next year. #rocketscience https://techcrunch.com/2023/10/10/evolution-space-to-build-solid-rocket-motor-testing-center-at-nasa-stennis/

stories.Title: Good things are coming
stories.Description: The European space industry receives a boost from Spain as PLD Space conquers obstacles with the Miura 1 rocket launch. After a few challenges, it's a promising step forward.
stories.Tweet: Good things are coming 📦 The European space industry receives a boost from Spain as PLD Space conquers obstacles with the Miura 1 rocket launch. stories.Title: Rain, rain, go away!
stories.Description: We're holding our breath for another exciting mission as NASA gets ready to launch its Psyche spacecraft. However, there's a weather forecast that might change our plans. Fingers crossed!
stories.Tweet: Rain, rain, go away! 📦 We're holding our breath for another exciting mission as NASA gets ready to launch its Psyche spacecraft. However, there's a weather forecast that might change our plans. Fingers crossed! #space https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/nasa-psyche-mission-faces-possible-delay/

stories.Title: A passwordless future
stories.Description: It's time to forget about all your passwords for good. Google is shifting toward passkeys as the default login option for personal accounts, enhancing security and user experience.
stories.Tweet: A passwordless future 📦 It's time to forget about all your passwords for good. Google is shifting toward passkeys as the default login option for personal accounts, enhancing security and user experience. #google https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/10/google-will-now-make-passkeys-the-default-for-personal-accounts/

stories.Title: From an asteroid far away
stories.Description: Bennu's revelations are here! The presence of water and carbon compounds opens a window into Earth's past, and this is just the beginning of NASA's asteroid endeavors.
stories.Tweet: From an asteroid far away 📦 Bennu's revelations are here! The presence of water and carbon compounds opens a window into Earth's past, and this is just the beginning of NASA's asteroid endeavors. #space https://www.space.com/osiris-rex-bennu-asteroid-sample-carbon-water

title: Finally! Here's Bennu, AI's environmental impact, No more AI hype
description: Today marked a significant milestone in space exploration. The canister containing samples from asteroid Bennu has been opened, and oh boy, there are big surprises inside. Analysts are warning us about AI's potential impact on the environment. It is important to take action before it is too late. And, in another forecast, it appears that in 2024, AI may not be as hyped as it is right now. Trends come and go, right?
